metadata.title: CVE-2019-14294 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Xpdf 4.01.01. There is a use-after-free in thefunction JPXStream::fillReadBuf at JPXStream.cc, due to an out of boundsread.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14294` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu4
libpoppler-cpp0t64 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu4
libpoppler-glib8t64 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu4
libpoppler-qt5-1t64 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu4
libpoppler-qt6-3t64 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu4
libpoppler134 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu4
poppler-utils - 0.76.1-0ubuntu4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: poppler package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.76.1-0ubuntu4').
ipe package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
